title: Applying Conclusions From a Sample to a Population
question_text:
A large random sample of people aged $18$ to $35$ living in the state of Alabama was taken and each individual was surveyed to determine their views on gun control.
To which of the following populations might the results of the survey apply?

choices.text: All people living in the state of Alabama.
All people living in the United States.
Only people aged $18$ to $35$ living in the southern portion of the United States.
Only people aged $18$ to $35$ living in the state of Alabama.
Only the individuals who were included in the survey.
